original_text: When the Lord gives his command, enemies will destroy all the houses, great and small. They will break them all into pieces.
korean_text: 보라 여호와께서 명령하시므로 타격을 받아 큰 집은 갈라지고 작은 집은 터지리라

sentences.original_text: When the Lord gives his command
enemies will destroy all the houses
They will break them all into pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 모든 것들을 산산조각 낼 것입니다
